body_html:
I met the same issue at line 78 of https://github.com/hunkim/PyTorchZeroToAll/blob/master/12_2_hello_rnn.py . Can anybody help to have a look? I'm using torch 0.4.0 and torchvision 0.2.1 ...

import torch
torch.version
'0.4.0'
import torchvision
torchvision.version
'0.2.1'

Cheers
Pei

body:
I met the same issue at line 78 of [https://github.com/hunkim/PyTorchZeroToAll/blob/master/12_2_hello_rnn.py](https://github.com/hunkim/PyTorchZeroToAll/blob/master/12_2_hello_rnn.py) . Can anybody help to have a look? I'm using torch 0.4.0 and torchvision 0.2.1 ...

> >>> import torch
> >>> torch.__version__
> '0.4.0'
> >>> import torchvision
> >>> torchvision.__version__
> '0.2.1'

Cheers
Pei
